item.description: On Tuesday, October 25, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Original Sin: Can't Live With It, Can't Live Without It,” a talk by Richard Schoenig, Prof. of Philosophy (San Antonio College), based on www.infidels.org/library/modern/richard_schoenig/original-sin.html. Location: Rm. 339 in the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Talk: "Original Sin: Can't Live With It, Can't Live Without It"
